name: Overdrive Warfare
storyline: Overdrive Warfare is a dark, gritty FPS shooter developed by the indie developer known as Dynamite. Immerse yourself in the gripping narrative of a harrowing modern-day conflict as global coalition forces unite against an insidious and unyielding enemy, your mission is to reclaim control of the once peaceful island known as 'Pulsar.'
summary: Overdrive Warfare is a dark, gritty FPS shooter developed by the indie developer known as Dynamite. Immerse yourself in the gripping narrative of a harrowing modern-day conflict unfolding as global coalition forces unite against an insidious and unyielding enemy.
